commit message: Initial commit
adding in first code

use secure comm socket if device is paired
- also add support for sharing of app APK directly
rename to Gilgamesh

add multi-message buffer to help reduce missed messages
- also, startDiscovery() inside of setupChat() so it happens after bluetooth is enabled
updated info on the app design
add easy retweet by long pressing on message
updated readme
updating the title
adding in screenshots
Update README.md
Removed unused imports.
Removed an unused variable.
Use a single prompt to enable Bluetooth and discoverability.

only become discoverable once you send a message
- this allows people to just read/consume without broadcasting
- also improve the short ID by using last 6 characters (more unique)

Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/akwizgran/gilgamesh into akwizgran-master

Conflicts:
app/src/info/guardianproject/gilga/GilgaMesh.java

Added support for WifiDirect aka WifiP2pManager API
We can use WifiDirect in the same way we use Bluetooth, by changing
the device name, though the length is possibly more limited TBD
WifiDirects range is quite a bit better, so this is a big++ for devices
that can support it.
if bluetooth is off, turn it on w/o requiring discovery

only start rfcomm socket if you are broadcasting
it is not needed if you are just a lurker
-also add autoretweet feature for paired/trusted senders
to help extend the mesh
updated manifest version number
improve autoRT mode, so that it doesn't loop spam everyone
remove unnecessary toast
enable share to be over bluetooth only (to simplify things)
move chatwindow setup to onCreate() so it doesn't get reset

turn repeater mode off by default
also don't limit shareAPK to bluetooth only
major refactoring (a Service!) and UI update
make sure DM color is reset, and a newline is added
update to 0.0.3
